heading: Night Out at the Museum with our 2015 Best Catches
subheading: Get to know six of South Florida’s hottest singles.
authorDetails:
Photography by Jason Nuttle

Shot on location at the Boca Raton Museum of Art

Styled by: Anthony TamburrinoHair and makeup by: Danielle Helms

Photo assistance by: Hector Rebellion
summary:
Jacquie Mero is wearing: Tadashi Shoji dress, $388, Bloomingdale's at Aventura Mall; Cristino 18kt gold bangle with diamonds, $28,000, Cristino Fine Jewelry; Bellarri flower necklace, $16,790, Cristino Fine Jewelry; Bellarri matching earrings, $6,200 (pair), Cristino Fine Jewelry.

Sean Conner is wearing: Waldan World Timer 18kt gold/black band, $15,000, Cristino Fine Jewelry; Maus & Hoffman suit, $695, pocket square, $50, tie, $230, and leather belt, $175, Maus & Hoffman.

itemscollection.headline: Joe Costello
itemscollection.description:
33, Sagittarius

Attorney

Describe yourself in three words. Compassionate. Driven. Stoic.

What's your spirit animal? Wolf.What are the top three qualities that attract you to someone? Respectfulness. Self-sufficiency. Confidence.What's a deal breaker in a relationship? Smoking.What's your perfect first date? I'm old school – dinner and drinks. You can learn a lot about someone by the way they interact with waiters and waitresses and the way they order a meal.On the first date, do you split the check, have your date pay, or do you pick up the tab? I always pick up the tab, unless it's Oprah, then she's paying.If you had three wishes, what would you wish for? Perfect health. Encyclopedic knowledge of anything and everything. For society to have a lot more compassion for those less fortunate (people and animals).Tell us a fun fact about you. I'll give you two: One, I was a spelling bee champion in elementary school. Two, I won a “knobby knees” contest on a cruise when I was 15.What do you like to do for fun? Live sports, live music, spending quality time with my family and my new nephew, traveling, wine tasting, college football Saturday barbecues.

Art: Magnus Sodamin, Secret Garden 3, 2012. Mixed media on canvas.

Maus & Hoffman black leather belt, $225, Maus & Hoffman; Solemare shirt, $225, Maus & Hoffman; Maus & Hoffman tie, $125, and sweater, $185, Maus & Hoffman; Burberry watch, Joe's own; Pants, Joe's own.

itemscollection.headline: Kathleen Cannon
itemscollection.description:
51, Pisces

Non-profit CEO

Describe yourself in three words. Passionate. A little dorky (in a fun way). Very caring.What's your dream job? I am definitely doing it now, but I would also love to be a sports anchor and an entrepreneur running social enterprises and for-profit businesses.What's your spirit animal? Sea otter. They are so playful, sort of hammy sweet and always seem to be spreading happiness.What are the top three qualities that attract you to someone? Chemistry, sense of humor and confidence.What's your perfect first date? A cup of coffee is a good first date to break the ice, but a second date is a fantastic dinner out.On the first date, do you split the check, have your date pay, or do you pick up the tab? For me, it depends on who asked who out. If I initiate the date, I should pay and vice versa.If you had three wishes, what would you wish for? Well due to my profession, I would certainly wish for positive impactful changes to big social issues and, of course, I wish for a very long, happy life for my son.Tell us a fun fact about you. I am a sports junkie. First thing I do every morning is turn on ESPN and it's the last thing I watch at night. And I listen to local sports. radio in the car.

Art: Sculpture in front: Wendy Wischer, Angels & Ancestors, 2007; Sculpture in back: Bhakti Baxter, An Intelligible Sphere, 2006. MDF, EPS foam, plaster and paint.

Assael ring, $17,400, Cristino Fine Jewelry; Cristino necklace, $88,200, Cristino Fine Jewelry; Assael earrings, $29,600, Cristino Fine Jewelry; Cristino bracelet, $46,000, Cristino Fine Jewelry; Diane von Furstenberg clutch, $195, Bloomingdale's at Town Center at Boca Raton; Stuart Weitzman shoes, $355, Bloomingdale's at Town Center at Boca Raton; Karen Millen dress, $360, Bloomingdale's at Aventura Mall.

itemscollection.headline: Alysia Naples
itemscollection.description:
24, Virgo

Publicist

Describe yourself in three words. Genuine. Playful. Perceptive.What's your dream job? To own and operate a lion sanctuary in South Africa.What's your spirit animal? To be honest, I didn't know what a “spirit animal” was, but according to the quiz I just took, I'm a tiger.What are the top three qualities that attract you to someone? Quick wit. Charisma. Sincerity.What's a deal breaker in a relationship? Dishonesty.What's your perfect first date? One that includes comfortable conversation, a few laughs and great food.On the first date, do you split the check, have your date pay, or do you pick up the tab? I think whoever initiated the first date should pick up the tab.Tell us a fun fact about you. I spend Sundays watching “RedZone.”What do you like to do for fun? I love anything to do with the ocean. I'm always wanting to learn and try new things, so fun is something spontaneous and different. I have a little-kid mentality, so I'm easily entertained. And I'm also a big fan of brunch.

Art: Louise Nevelson, Shadow Chord, 1969. Painted wood construction.

Ted Baker dress, $295, Bloomingdale's at Aventura Mall; Gold statement necklace, $58, Bloomingdale's at Town Center at Boca Raton; Orlandini 18kt bracelet with diamonds, $15,400, Cristino Fine Jewelry; Cristino 18kt earrings with diamond, $3,950, Cristino Fine Jewelry; Salvatore Ferragamo “Pimpa” pumps, $650, Bloomingdale's at Town Center at Boca Raton; Salvatore Ferragamo “Sofia” handbag, $2,150, Bloomingdale's at Town Center at Boca Raton.

itemscollection.headline: Mark Zeidman
itemscollection.description:
34, Taurus

Real estate agent and investment services specialist

Describe yourself in three words. Focused. Entrepreneurial. Relaxed.What's your dream job? For the most part, I'm living it. I enjoy working hard for my clients to maximize their investments. The only other goal is to own my own office buildings, but I'm getting closer to achieving that.Describe your perfect day off from work. With a phone, not sure that's truly possible anymore – ha. However, I enjoy being outdoors. So a game of basketball or tennis, beach time and a barbecue.What's your spirit animal? For 34 years, I've never thought about what spirit animal I'd be. I love cows, but doubt I want to be one. I guess I'd be a dog, easily entertained and loyal, and I suppose the attention is nice.What are the top three qualities that attract you to someone? One, talkers. I enjoy the company of a chatterbox. Two, dancing. I like someone who enjoys dancing. Everyone is in a good mood when they dance. Three, easy going. I'm not a planner in my personal life. I go with the flow and like a companion that does the same.What's a deal breaker in a relationship? Disrespect. I talk all differences out and rationalize. I don't tolerate comments if they are irrational and disrespectful.On the first date, do you split the check, have your date pay, or do you pick up the tab? I pick up the tab. It's always a privilege to meet someone for the first time. I'm happy to pay for it.Tell us a fun fact about you. I barbecue. My friends will tell you they come over to my house on the weekends, where I usually smoke brisket, ribs, chicken, fish, etc. and turn it into an all-day event. Also, as a fourth-generation Texan, I love going to the country and western dance bars in South Florida.

Art: Jose Alvarez (D.O.P.A), Untitled, 2014. Vinyl.

Hickey Freeman sport jacket, $1,195, Maus & Hoffman; Eton shirt, $255, Maus & Hoffman; Stefano Ricci printed tie, $265, Maus & Hoffman; Maus & Hoffman slacks, $175, Maus & Hoffman; Martin Dingman suede belt, $85, Maus & Hoffman; Michael Kors watch, Mark's own.

itemscollection.headline: Sean Conner
itemscollection.description:
26, Pisces

Real estate investor

Describe yourself in three words. Entertaining. Driven. Adventurous.What's your dream job? Speaking on stage around the world and lighting people up.What do you like to do for fun? I love doing anything on the water. But anyone who knows me though knows my favorite thing to do is go salsa dancing!Describe your perfect day off from work. My perfect day off usually includes a day on the boat with my closest friends, then ending up at the house with food on the grill, good drinks and watching the Miami Heat game.What are the top three qualities that attract you to someone? Someone who has a big, giving heart, is driven and has a smile that will light up a room.What's a deal breaker in a relationship? It is impossible to narrow it down to one thing. Other than the obvious, which is cheating, I think the biggest thing that can kill a relationship is the lack of presence and lack of variety. Always spend your time with her as if it's the first time.What's your perfect first date? I like to stay semi casual, fun and relaxed. Any cool place to have a drink, laugh and get to know each other. I love to laugh. So, a comedy club after would be a must.On the first date, do you split the check, have your date pay, or do you pick up the tab? Although I find it attractive when she tries to pick up the check, I always pay!Tell us a fun fact about you. I am obsessed with Tony Robbins. If I could only own one thing to my name, it would be my Tony Robbins intervention DVDs.

Art: Arman, Music Power II, 2002. Bronze.

Maus & Hoffman sweater, $325, Maus & Hoffman; Mezlan Platinum ostrich driving shoes, $495, Maus & Hoffman; Waldan 18kt gold watch, $25,000, Cristino; Maus & Hoffman Lewis check sport shirt, $165, Maus & Hoffman; Maus & Hoffman pants, $795, patchwork brown belt, $395, Maus & Hoffman.

itemscollection.headline: Jacquie Mero
itemscollection.description:
31, Sagittarius

Trading assistant

Describe yourself in three words. Joyful. Free-spirited. Passionate.What's your dream job? Yoga instructor and art curator.Describe your perfect day off from work. It would start with an early morning hot yoga class, followed by stopping at my favorite juice bar for a healthy snack and some coffee. Then, heading over to the beach to read a good book and cool off in the ocean. It would finish with just completely indulging myself in a peaceful day with no set plans or obligations, and going with the flow.What's your spirit animal? Blue marlin.What are the top three qualities that attract you to someone? Intelligence. Humor. Integrity.What's a deal breaker in a relationship? Dishonesty.What's your perfect first date? Something down-to-earth, but fun and unique. Like watching a live band at a local, hidden gem or maybe paddleboarding to a lunch spot by the beach.On the first date, do you split the check, have your date pay, or do you pick up the tab? I value balance and am not against splitting checks. But on the first date, I am traditional and say he pays.If you had three wishes, what would you wish for? If I told you, then they wouldn't come true. But if I must: One, to have more hours in a day. Two, to have the ability to use the other 90 percent of my brain. Three, to travel the world.

Art: Jedd Novatt, Chaos, 2004-05. Bronze.

Bellarri bracelet, $8,500, Cristino Fine Jewelry; Bellarri ring, $2,335, Cristino Fine Jewelry; Bellarri earrings, $3,600, Cristino Fine Jewelry; Garavelli watch, $21,290, Cristino Fine Jewelry; Tadashi Shoji dress, $324, Bloomingdale's at Aventura Mall.
